about_the_game:
An Eternal Dream, Returning to Old Haunts.

The Paper Bride 6 Nightmare artbook offers an in-depth look at the character designs, core concepts, and creative ideas that shaped the game during development. It also includes previously unreleased core design concepts and the beloved promotional artwork. Step into the world of Paper Bride and uncover the secrets behind its creation.

This collection features:

Character designs and early concept sketches

Design inspirations and thought processes

Scene atmosphere concept designs

Prop designs

Exclusive promotional artwork for the Steam version

Tracing the Roots of an Ancient Nightmare Across Time

Discover the stories behind Eternal Nightmare and explore the mysteries of this enduring tale.

name: Paper Bride 6 Nightmare - Original Artwork & Concept Art

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • Storage: 47 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This art collection for "Paper Bride 6 Nightmare" showcases high-definition promotional artwork, unreleased concept art and creative ideas for this new installment in the Paper Bride series. Welcome to the world of Paper Bride.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
